item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in creating engaging social media content for rap artists. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage to create visually appealing and attention-grabbing videos. Your main focus will be on producing content for various social media platforms, including Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of rap culture and be able to apply creative editing techniques to highlight the artist's style and personality.

Key Skills:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong knowledge of social media platforms and their specific video requirements
- Ability to edit videos to match the artist's brand and style
- Understanding of rap music and culture
- Attention to detail and strong organizational skills

This is a small-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Expertise Level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:10 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: I need a developer who understands HTML code to help me fix something on a web page - Upwork
item.description:
I have a Vimeo video embedded on a landing page in a page builder that has some custom code that works as follows:

When the page loads the video is auto playing with no sound and it has 2 graphics on it:
1. Play button in the middle of the video
2. CLICK PLAY FOR SOUND

When the user clicks on the video the video plays with sound.

I need to use the same HTML for another Vimeo video on another page but I dont know how to edit the code on the new page to make it work.

I need someone who is confident they can help me to get on a zoom call with me asap to review this job and then do the work for me once they fully understand what's required.

Hourly Range: $17.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:06 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:HTML
Skills: HTML
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Math Channel Editor/VFX Artist - Upwork
item.description:
Role:
Looking for a skilled Editor/VFX Artist to create visually compelling and informative videos for our math-themed YouTube channel. Expertise in 2D motion graphics and a basic understanding of math concepts are crucial for this role.
Responsibilities:
Edit and assemble raw footage into a polished final product, maintaining logical sequencing and smooth pacing.
Create and integrate motion graphics and visual effects to explain math concepts effectively.
Collaborate with scriptwriters and voice-over artists to ensure a cohesive narrative.
Deliver high-quality, visually engaging videos within deadlines.
Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing and motion graphics creation (knowledge of software like Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro).
Basic understanding of math concepts to accurately visualize complex ideas.
Strong visual storytelling skills with attention to detail.
Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines, while maintaining creative standards.


Budget: $20
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Animation Video - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Animation Video Creator

Job Description:

We are seeking a talented and experienced animation video creator to bring our vision to life. The project involves creating a high-quality animated video featuring a lion. The animation should depict the lion running, then jumping behind our logo, and finally integrating into the logo with just the lion's paw remaining visible within the logo. This video will be used for branding purposes and should align with our company's aesthetic and professional standards.

Requirements:

Proven experience in animation and video creation, with a portfolio of previous work.
Ability to create smooth and realistic animations, especially of animal movements.
Proficiency in relevant software such as Adobe After Effects, Blender, or similar.
Strong attention to detail and creativity in visual storytelling.
Ability to understand and incorporate our brand elements into the animation seamlessly.
Excellent communication skills to collaborate and understand project requirements.
Project Details:

Duration: The final video should be around 10-20 seconds long.
Style: Realistic animation with a focus on fluid motion and professional finish.
Branding: The animation must incorporate our logo and adhere to our brand colors and aesthetic.
Deliverables: Final animated video in high resolution, source files, and any additional elements used in the creation process.
Application Process:
Please provide:

A brief description of your approach to this project.
Examples of similar work from your portfolio.
Your estimated timeline and cost for completing this project.
We look forward to working with a creative professional who can help us achieve a dynamic and visually appealing animation for our brand.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$48.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 19:49 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:2D Animation, Animation, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, 3D Animation
Skills: 2D Animation, Animation, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, 3D Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Expert Youtube Video Editor Required! - Upwork
item.description:
We are about to take our social media game to a new level and we are looking for an EXPERT Youtube video editor to come on board and take control of our video editing for us.

You will be required to take a simple recorded video, and make it pop with creative editing, wording, graphics, motion, and effects, along with taking key elements out of the long form video and chop it up to create Youtube shorts too.

Must have a portfolio of work to demonstrate the video editing expertise for growing a channel on Youtube.

The right candidate will be chosen to complete a test project with a pre-recorded video we have already.

Thanks and we look forward to working with you!

Hourly Range: $22.00-$38.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 19:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Video Production in Chicago - Upwork
item.description:
Videographer Needed for Bold Generative AI Videocast in Chicago

Job Overview:
We're looking for a dynamic videographer to shoot, edit, and produce a 20-30 minute videocast featuring two thought leaders discussing Generative AI in the Enterprise. This project will be fast-paced, edgy, and creatively demanding.

What You'll Do:

Conduct a 1-2 hour video shoot in Chicago (Address TBD).
Record a videocast with a bit of movement—think podcast meets TED Talk with some arm-waving and room-walking.
Will take one or two cameras; mostly stationary (won't need two cameras moving).
Edit the footage into a bold, punchy 20-30 minute videocast.
Include supers, study data cut-ins (images provided), branded intro and outro (logos, etc., provided), and engaging video effects and sounds.
Work improvisationally and fast, adapting and contributing creative ideas.
Complete the shoot, including setup and load out, within 3 hours. Editing should be around 8 hours.


Requirements:

Proven experience in video shooting and editing.
We aren't looking for someone with 75 years of experience....
We want to work with people who come in ready to try new things.
Ability to produce high-energy, visually appealing content.
Quick adaptability and strong creative input.
Comfortable with fast-paced, improvisational work.
If you have any specific questions, please contact Siddhi at siddhi.pradhan@ascendion.com.


Our Style:

We are from Ascendion (a global AI-first software engineering services company).
We work fast and expect quick turnarounds.
We WANT to try  new things and improvise on the spot.
Two rounds of feedback max, with the final video ready within 7-8 days post-shoot.
If you're up for a provocative, edgy, and fun project, we want to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 19:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Nonfiction, Video Intro & Outro, Camera Operation, Social Media Video, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Nonfiction, Video Intro & Outro, Camera Operation, Social Media Video, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00

item.title: Contract Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are a social impact organisation wanting to tell a story about the projects we do.

We are looking for a talented contract video editor to join our team. As a video editor, you will be responsible for taking our raw footage and using our branding and theme to create world-class videos.

Will do both long form (2-3min) and shorter videos (less than 30sec) for social media content.

Your attention to detail and creativity will be crucial in bringing our vision to life. The ideal candidate will have a strong sense of storytelling, excellent video editing skills, and a deep understanding of our brand.
   
   Responsibilities:
   - Edit raw footage to create visually appealing videos
   - Incorporate our branding and theme into all video content
   - Ensure the videos are of high quality and meet our standards
   - Collaborate with the team to understand the project requirements and objectives
   - Stay up-to-date with the latest video editing techniques and trends

   Requirements:
   - Proven experience in video editing
   - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
   - Strong sense of storytelling and ability to create engaging videos
   - Attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines
   - Understanding of our brand and ability to incorporate it into the videos

We want to see your example portfolio. Looking to use the latest and trendiest video editing techniques to create engaging content.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 19:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Country: New Zealand
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Facebook/YouTube Ads (Retention Editing) Graphic Design - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a highly experienced editor for our facebook and youtube video ads.

Please provide examples of video ads that you have edited and/or add graphic designs to and/or did the retention editing, adding sound design, etc.

If you do not submit examples, you will not be considered. Thank you for your understanding.

Our company has been on the Inc. 5000 list of fastest growing companies for the last 3 years and we are growing rapidly. We receive all our customers from direct response ads on facebook and youtube. Which is why we need someone to help us edit our videos to increase the engagement and conversion.

If you have experience increasing engagement, view time, conversion, etc. that is a huge plus.

We put our new ads every month so this can lead to long term work and we hope to have a long working relationship with you.

Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 24, 2024 19:16 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Skills: Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation

item.title: Youtube Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Hey,
we run a Youtube channel about "Darts" with 8000 subscribers and are looking for a channel manager to further professionalize the channel.

The following tasks are part of the job:
- Coordination between Script Writer & Video Editor
- Upload the videos including SEO
- Provide scripts with AI voice over
- Researching video topics
- Monitoring the channel performance
- Connection between employees and boss

What you should be able to do:
- Working with Trello
- Friendly interaction with colleagues
- Dealing with ElevenLabs (AI Voice Over)
- Youtube Research
- Youtube SEO
- Analyzing Youtube data

We look forward to receiving your application.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 24, 2024 19:14 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Virtual Assistance, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube
Skills: Virtual Assistance, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube
Country: Germany
